p: The data are shown as means Â±SEM of at least 3 independent experiments. Normality of the data was checked using the Kolmogorov-Smirnov test and analysis was performed using the t test. The Statistical Package for Social Sciences (IBM SPSS), version 21 was used for statistical analysis. P values <0.05 (*), <0.01 (**), <0.001 (***) were considered significant.
